alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:57AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Iberia, Lafayette, St. Mary, northeastern Vermilion, St. Martin and southeastern St. Landry Parishes through 730 AM CDT... At 656 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge to 8 miles southeast of Intracoastal City. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Opelousas, Morgan City, Abbeville, Catahoula, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Franklin, Carencro, St. Martinville, Patterson, Jeanerette, Berwick, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Belle River, Intracoastal City and Bayou Vista. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 96 and 128. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Lafayette; Lower Iberia; Lower St. Martin; Lower St. Mary; Lower Vermilion; St. Landry; Upper Iberia; Upper St. Martin; Upper St. Mary; Upper Vermilion
